243173203218608518.Text: Bears are but one of the sacred creatures the All-Maker has blessed us with. They embody the warrior's strength, and some of the Skaal can even summon them to fight by their sides.

1369464391300632035.Text: Lots of them around this island. Some of them are pretty nasty, even diseased. Doesn't pay to mess with them, though their pelts can be valuable, I hear.

822716666272044921.Text: Bears are all over Solstheim. If you see one, be careful. They're vicious fighters, and some are known to be diseased.

25634321782288814951.Text: Bears are all over Solstheim. If you see one, be careful. They're vicious fighters, and some are known to be diseased.
